{{Description|"The law is only established after its publication, and above that, the laws of nature have governed all species and eras since ancient times.}}
'''O Tides, I Have Returned''' is [[Neuvillette]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Sourcewater Droplets generated by Neuvillette can be absorbed by the [[Hydro Traveler]] and vice versa.
* Up to '''12''' Sourcewater Droplets spawned by Neuvillette can exist at one time. If more Sourcewater Droplets are created while there are 12 on the field, the oldest Sourcewater Droplets will despawn.
** Sourcewater Droplets spawned by Hydro Traveler do not count towards this limit.
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], players can only see and interact with Sourcewater Droplets spawned by themselves.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Axiomatic Judgment}}
